Class ClientMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientMain

  • public class ClientMain
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a main method that will instantiate a new ClientInstance.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Scanner kb
      kb is a Scanner used to read input from user.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Instantiates a new Client Instance.

        Firstly, prompts the client for a IP Address and validates it with a Regular Expression validIP.

        Secondly, prompts the client for a Port number and validates it with a valid range [1024,65535].

        If targetIP and port are valid, the program will try to build a connection with the target server.

        If any validation fails, the program will exit with an error message.

        Parameters:
        args - the supplied command-line arguments as an array of String objects

      • validateIP

        public static boolean validateIP(java.lang.String targetIP)
        Validates a IP Address with a Regular Expression of IP Address.
        Parameters:
        targetIP - the IP Address entered by the user
        Returns:
        true, if and only if, the given IP Address matches the regular expression of a valid IP Address or it is 'localhost'

      • validatePort

        public static boolean validatePort(java.lang.String targetPort)
        Validates a port number with a acceptable range [1024,65535]
        Parameters:
        targetPort - the target port number which is a String entered by the user
        Returns:
        true, if and only if, targetPort can be parsed into a number which is between 1024 and 65535
